abstract: This year the leaders of some of the world’s most respected financial institutions  have been caught either unaware or uninformed about giant risks their companies took.
snippet: This year the leaders of some of the world’s most respected financial institutions  have been caught either unaware or uninformed about giant risks their companies took.
lead_paragraph: NEVER in the history of Wall Street have so many who are so senior fallen so fast.

headline.main: The Year of Puncturing Wall Street Orthodoxy
headline.print_headline: The Year of Puncturing Wall Street Orthodoxy
